name: Impactyn B.V
description: Developer of an AI-powered social media platform intended to bring a positive impact in the world of social media marketing. The company's platform connects everyone from big corporations to SMEs with real consumers through trusted, organic engagement and reach, enabling social media users to turn their organic social media content into online marketing through digital word of mouth that can be rewarded in cash or other benefits.
one_liner: Developer of an AI-powered social media platform intended to bring a positive impact in the world of social media marketing. name: QiDZ Holding LTD
description: Developer of a mobile application designed to help users find, plan, and book fun activities to do with kids. The company's application provides a one-stop destination for kids-related fun, education, entertainment, and activities for kids of all ages, enabling users to discover fun and educational activities, deals, and restaurants and book online instantly.
one_liner: Developer of a mobile application designed to help users find, plan, and book fun activities to do with kids. The company's application provides a one-stop destination for kids-related fun, education, entertainment, and activities for kids of all ages, enabling users to discover fun and educational activities, deals, and restaurants and book online instantly.

name: Red Tricycle, Inc.
description: Provider of an online community designed to help parents have more fun with their kids. The company's online community focuses on offering ideas that are aspirational and actionable and also connects families with localized points of interests, enabling parents to do fun things with their kids and to identify their specific interests through various demographic filters, and essentially connect with a virtual tour guide.

name: The Ticket Fairy, Inc.
description: Ticket Fairy is Salesforce meets Eventbrite - AI-enabled vertical SaaS for events and venues that skyrockets their revenues and accelerates their path to profitability!
one_liner: Ticket Fairy is Salesforce meets Eventbrite - AI-enabled vertical SaaS for events and venues that skyrockets their revenues and accelerates their path to profitability!
industry: AI/Machine Learning, Blockchain, Leisure & Entretainment, Marketplace, SaaS, Ticketing, Web 3, CRM, Entertainment / Media, Social Media, B2B Marketplaces, Commerce

name: VoyceMe Inc.
description: Developer a social creator platform designed to allow social interaction among fans and authors. The company offers original manga, webcomics, and web novels, by giving historically underserved creators new ways to tell their stories, generate revenue, and engage with their fans, enabling readers to find new stories and the ability to experience them through immersive storytelling and helping authors monetize their stories and build and engage their fan base.
